condition.description:
### ⚠️ Caution

This power type does **not** support a `condition`. If the `condition` field is present, it will be ignored.

If you wish to check for an entity condition before applying the restriction, you can use the [Conditioned Restrict Armor](conditioned_restrict_armor.md) power type instead.
